message: Let's start with a fair offer, Bob. I take 60% and you get a solid 40%.
I think we can both do better. I'll take 55% and leave you with 45%. This gives us both a good starting point.
Okay, Bob, let's meet in the middle. I'll take a little less than my first offer - 56% -  and you get 44%. This seems fair considering the time pressure.
